description:
Recently，more and more people are inclined to think too much , but do so little.Some people always make firm decision while never take any action to move towards their goals.It is difficult to the point of impossibility to imagine that one could get what he wants simply by thinking rather than acting.
     There are two causes for this social phenomenon.To begin with , to dream takes little effort but to action is more tired.In addition , the problem correlates strongly with the societal environment at large , with the stress from the society,many people seem to lack the confidence to face the difficulties , they always postpone their planes.
     You reap what you sow.Each of us should join in the tide of promoting actions.A person’s ability is finally recognized by his achievements instead of his ability of dream.

  • 别笑，川普老婆真的是当之无愧的“第一”夫人
  • 雅思写作：哪些句型可以重复使用呢？
  • 2016年度网络热词：蓝瘦香菇等英语都怎么说？
  • 双语美文：小伯特的感恩节（第一话）
  • 四六级听力真题完美训练6步法
  • 外媒：20世纪最美的10位女星 第1居然不是赫本
  • BEC高级：巧用词汇句型，拿下图表作文
  • 川普豪宅长这样：住白宫真是委屈他了……
  • 史上最糟糕的学习方法，你中招了吗？

title: 大学英语六级英语作文范文：行动上的矮子，思想上的巨人
